name: RepDetailsPanel
functionalRequirements:
## Rep Details Panel

### Purpose
Slide-out panel showing detailed sales rep performance metrics.

### Features
- Rep name and title header
- Performance metrics cards
- Deal pipeline breakdown
- Recent activities list
- Performance chart
- Close button

dataRequirements.description: Receives rep data and metrics from parent

technicalDesign:
## Implementation

### Props
- rep: Selected rep object
- isOpen: Panel visibility
- onClose: Close callback

### Layout
- Fixed position slide-out
- Header with rep info
- Metrics grid
- Scrollable content
